law.catch_line: Positions of commercial vehicle enforcement officer, commercial vehicle enforcement officer R Class, arson investigator officer, hazardous devices investigator officer, and facilities security officer created within department.

text.section: These positions shall be appointed pursuant to KRS 16.188 and shall be utilized by the commissioner to enforce the laws of the Commonwealth and to comply with federal and state mandates.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 5, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 75, sec. 2, effective June 25, 2009.
